mapper.insert: insert into rcm_meeting_prep_info ( id, appointment_meeting_id, type_code, meeting_theme, meeting_content, chairman, committee_member, meeting_begin_time, meeting_end_time, flag ) values ( rcm_meeting_prep_info_seq.nextval, #{AppointmentMeeTingId}, #{TypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{MeeTingTheme,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{MeeTingContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Chairman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CommitteeMember,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_date(#{MeeTingBeginTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd,hh24:mi:ss'), to_date(#{MeeTingEndTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd,hh24:mi:ss'), #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
